es.cost: Varies by package. Movistar+ from €25/month, DAZN from €9.99/month
es.restrictions: Some games may be exclusive to certain platforms
es.additionalInfo: Movistar+ and DAZN have the main broadcasting rights. ACB TV offers some free content and highlights. Regional channels may broadcast local team games.

gb.additionalInfo: DAZN occasionally broadcasts ACB games. ACB TV offers some free content and highlights.

us.additionalInfo: FloSports occasionally broadcasts ACB games. ACB TV offers some free content and highlights.

au.additionalInfo: ACB TV offers some free content and highlights. Full game broadcasts are rare.
